title: Lynx Looking for Junglers (Pref D2 and Above)
body:
Thank you to all applicants that applied to our previous post.
We now have several applicants for every role apart from **jungle**
If you are a jungler than we are **interested in you**. We are also willing to consider Junglers within the **diamond rank** but a higher solo queue ranking will put you at the top of the contact list.

Below are the benefits we are providing in the form of incentives if you promote into OCS.
Player - $800 per player ($100 for making promotion match + $700 upon promoting to OCS)

Please fill out the application form below : The application will also act as a way to judge your suitability based on your answers.
[Application Form](https://goo.gl/forms/bmAwcmkiV0siybP32)

Remember that this will be done under a contractual obligation. 

If you have any questions feel free to leave me a message here.

If you are interested in checking us out. Here are our social links:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/lynx_gg)
[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/lynxg/)
[Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0wcZ7p-FfrN7rSL1nRWlvQ)
